name: svelte-aoe
description: Animate elements on enter with Svelte.
readme: # Svelte AnimateOnEnter Create captivating web experiences with the `svelte-aoe` package. `svelte-aoe` utilizes the [Intersection Observer API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API) to detect when an element enters the viewport. When the element is detected as being in the viewport, `svelte-aoe` applies a class that triggers a CSS animation. ## Installation ``` npm i svelte-aoe --save-dev ``` ## Setup - Import the package ``` import AnimateOnEnter from 'svelte-aoe'; ``` - Add the component to your layout/page. ``` ``` - Apply a `data-aoe` attribute to the element that you want to animate and define an animation. ``` ``` ## Example: SvelteKit Global Setup File: `src/routes/+layout.svelte` ``` ``` ## Animations - `up` - `right` - `left` - `down` - `fade` - `fade-up` - `fade-right` - `fade-left` - `fade-down` --- ❤️ Inspired by [Animate on Scroll](https://michalsnik.github.io/aos/)
